title: Wall Street Breakfast, April 5th: Kudlow Talks Trade, Smucker Buys Pet Food, & Zuckerberg Speaks
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Today’s top stories: U.S. futures are set to rise as Larry Kudlow indicates tariffs might be negotiated; J.M. Smucker goes pet food shopping; and Mark Zuckerberg responds to the Cambridge Analytica scandal. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
